mapper.select:
select spm.product_model_id, spm.product_model_code, spm.product_model_name, spm.product_model_desc, spm.product_family_id, bpf.product_family_code, bpf.product_family_name, bpf.product_family_desc, spm.status, spm.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,spm.create_time, spm.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName,spm.modified_time,spm.is_delete from fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm left join ocean.sys_user u on spm.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on spm.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.base_product_family bpf on spm.product_family_id = bpf.product_family_id
1=1
and date_format(spm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and spm.product_model_code like CONCAT('%', #{productModelCode}, '%')
and spm.product_model_desc like CONCAT('%', #{productModelDesc}, '%')
and spm.status=#{status}
order by spm.create_time desc
